body.p: B. F. Rice was fined in this county some two years since $20- for gaming the fine was replevied by Ed. Gibson It Has been respited The respite is out or nearly so, If not remitted Gibson will have it to pay, There is no money in this country, and property will not sell for one tenth of its value, it would take at Least $100 worth of property at sheriffs sale to pay the debt --
Mr Gibson Has a petition in your office setting for the grounds that He asks for a remission of the fine
I would be pleased if you would remit the fine
